import React, { useState } from 'react' const Plane = () => { const [destination, setDestination] = useState(); const [departure, setDeparture] = useState(); const [planeType, setPlaneID] = useState(); const handleChangePlane = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setPlaneID(parseInt(e.plane.value)) console.log('plane:', planeType) } const handleChangeDeparture = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setDeparture(e.departure.value) console.log('departure:', departure) } const handleChangeDestination = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setDestination(e.destination.value) console.log('destination:', destination) } return (
Create New Flight
) } export default Plane
